name: The Terminator
description: The most gnarly firearm ever created, also known as a moving turret.

skills.normal_des: Tap normal attack to enter aiming mode. Hold normal attack to fire continuously, up to <shuzhi>40</> rounds. Each shot deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</>. Deal double damage when scoring a headshot or hitting an enemy's weak point, and knock the target down (headshots are ineffective against Wanderers).
skills.dodge: Dodge right before getting hit to activate a Phantasia, which reduces the speed of enemies within the area. Cooldown: 15 seconds. While dodging, you gain hitstun immunity for <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds.
skills.skill: Enable turret mode and fire large energy orbs, each dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</> and launching the target into the air. Become immune to hitstun and control effects while setting up the turret. Cooldown: <shuzhi>{2}</> seconds.
skills.discharge: When <red>weapon charge</> is full or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, <shuzhi>remove all debuffs from the wielder</> and fire an arctic beam upon switching to this weapon, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</> and inflict a <shuzhi>3</>-second <shuzhi>freeze</> effect. Also reduce the target's frost resistance by <shuzhi>50%</> for <shuzhi>10</> seconds.
